name: Gardner
message: I never imagined there would be such a long passageway beneath the mansion.　　　　　　　　Given this, it wouldn't be surprising if tunnels ran under all of Arkham.

name: Jonathan
message: With Philip's excessive wealth, accomplishing something like this probably wasn't all that difficult.

name: Gardner
message: But, to do something of this scale, a considerable number of workers would have been necessary.

name: Gardner
message: It's amazing it remained unknown to anyone until now.

name: Jonathan
message: The craftsmen who dug this tunnel likely never returned alive.

name: Gardner
message: He's certainly capable of that much.

name: Jonathan
message: He's the kind of man who would use innocent nuns as test subjects to create hybrids of Deep Ones and humans.

name: Gardner
message: Establishing Miskatonic University might have been for the same purpose.

name: Gardner
message: It's no wonder researchers driven mad like Herbert West were born from it.

name: Jonathan
message: The end of the tunnel is getting brighter.

name: Gardner
message: Seems we've reached our destination.

name: Jonathan
message: What a number...‥‥‥‥

name: Jonathan
message: It's shocking that such a vast space exists beneath the village, but even more so, what's with that number of Deep Ones?

name: Gardner
message: Even if you gathered all the villagers, you wouldn't get a number like that.
Where did they all come from...‥‥‥‥

name: Jonathan
message: Probably, some villagers who disappeared in the past are mixed in among them.

name: Gardner
message: Is this about the gravedigger's story that the people in this village don't die?
Even so, it's a huge number.

name: Jonathan
message: That's not all. There should have been quite a few Deep Ones even before Philip began his experiments.

name: Gardner
message: That ring of light-like thing...

name: Jonathan
message: Deep Ones are flying into it.

name: Gardner
message: So beyond that ring of light is the place where that monster called Cthulhu is.

name: Jonathan
message: Probably something Thomas opened.
The ritual had already begun.

name: Gardner
message: If they are called 'those who will become nourishment,' then that means beyond there is Cthulhu's stomach...

name: Jonathan
message: If I had made the wrong choice back there, I might have ended up like that too.

name: Gardner
message: No way in hell. God or whatever, I absolutely refuse to end up in the stomach of a guy like that.

name: Jonathan
message: We have to stop Thomas quickly.

name: Jonathan
message: Before Cthulhu awakens.

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan, over there...

name: Jonathan
message: It's Thomas and Cordelia.

name: Gardner
message: That fool... driven by greed.

name: Jonathan
message: It seems Cordelia is still safe for now.
Cordelia seems to be chained to the wall completely naked.
I can't tell well from here, but she appears to have lost consciousness.

name: Gardner
message: Let's go.
If we don't help her soon, something terrible will happen.

name: Jonathan
message: I'll go from the right side, Professor, you from the opposite...

name: Jonathan
message: I'll distract them, so get behind Thomas without being noticed.

name: Gardner
message: Understood, you be careful too.
That man is not sane; there's no telling what he'll do.

name: Thomas
message: That's the spirit, you monsters.
Hurry up and get swallowed by your boss's stomach！

name: Thomas
message: She'll wake up soon.
The monster that will make me the king of this world...

name: Thomas
message: I'm not some soft-hearted fool who'd share this power with anyone else.

name: Thomas
message: Heh, what's this 'secret society' nonsense.
This ain't the Boy Scouts, I can't be bothered with this crap.
Thomas spits out those words and tightens his grip on the Necronomicon he's holding under his arm.

name: Thomas
message: Just wait, little lady.

name: Thomas
message: I'll put you out of your misery real soon.

name: Jonathan
message: Like hell I'll let you！

name: Thomas
message: You're pretty damn late, aren't ya.
I thought you'd find this place a bit sooner.

name: Jonathan
message: I had some business to take care of.
Nai is dead, and your plans are ruined.

name: Thomas
message: That bastard's dead？
Good riddance, ain't got nothin' to do with me.

name: Jonathan
message: Do you think you can control Cthulhu alone？
That's impossible.

name: Thomas
message: Then I'll just die too, right？
I ain't scared.

name: Jonathan
message: What a selfish bastard.
I won't let you do that.

name: Thomas
message: Too late, that thing's already startin' to wake up.
All that's left is to feed it your precious little girl.

name: Jonathan
message: Do you think I'll just stand by and allow that？

name: Thomas
message: I ain't scared of a rich boy like you tryin' to act tough.　　　　　　 Hell, you're no different from the monster over there.

name: Thomas
message: Any time now, you could end up like that...

name: Jonathan
message: Shut up！

name: Thomas
message: Just shut up and watch from there.

name: Thomas
message: Watch what I do！

name: Gardner
message: Stop, Thomas！

name: Thomas
message: Wh-what are you doing?！

name: Jonathan
message: The Necronomicon...

name: Thomas
message: Let go... the book... my book...

name: Thomas
message: You son of a bitch...

name: Thomas
message: I'll kill you！

name: Gardner
message: Run... Jonathan！

name: Thomas
message: Let go！
No one's gettin' away... you're all gonna die here！

name: Gardner
message: Ha... hurry... Cordelia...

name: Thomas
message: Die... you bastard... die！

name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia... wake up！
Cordelia, cradled in my arms, showed no reaction to my words, lying perfectly still as if she had died.

name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia... oh, please...

name: Jonathan
message: Open your eyes...

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan...

name: Cordelia
message: Where... are we？

name: Cordelia
message: What... am I doing？

name: Jonathan
message: No time to explain, can you stand？

name: Cordelia
message: Wait a minute...

name: Cordelia
message: Doesn't look... like it.
My body won't listen to me.

name: Jonathan
message: It's okay, the wound isn't that deep.

name: Cordelia
message: Wound? What are you talking about?

name: Jonathan
message: I'll carry you. Can you bear with it for a little while？

name: Cordelia
message: Yeah.

name: Thomas
message: Ha, let go！

name: Thomas
message: Uwaaaaaaaah...

name: Jonathan
message: Professor！

name: Cordelia
message: What happened？

name: Cordelia
message: What happened...？

name: Jonathan
message: It's fine... You don't need to worry about anything.

name: Jonathan
message: Come on, let's go.

name: Cordelia
message: It's cold... Where are we going？

name: Jonathan
message: Just bear with it a little longer.

name: Jonathan
message: You'll be comfortable soon.

name: Cordelia
message: I'm okay, but...

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, am I heavy？
I should have tried to lose more weight for something like this.

name: Jonathan
message: What kind of foolish thing are you saying?

name: Jonathan
message: You don't need to worry about things like that.
You've suffered enough already, from now on...

name: Cordelia
message: We can go to London together, right？

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, that's right.

name: Cordelia
message: I wonder if we'll get to see all sorts of things.

name: Jonathan
message: Let's go to all sorts of places together.

name: Cordelia
message: I'm really looking forward to it...

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, it'll be fun for sure.

name: Nai
message: I won't... I won't let you...

name: Jonathan
message: Nai... You're still alive?

name: Nai
message: You are the last descendant of the important 'Covenanter'...

name: Nai
message: To awaken my master...

name: Nai
message: I absolutely will not let you escape...

name: Jonathan
message: I will absolutely never do as you say.
Because there's no reason for me to fear anything now！

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan......

name: Jonathan
message: You don't need to say anything. It's over now.

name: Cordelia
message: Is he dead...？

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, this time he won't ever wake up again.

name: Cordelia
message: I'm glad... This way it's really...

name: Jonathan
message: Come on, let's go.

name: Jonathan
message: We're getting out of this village.
After leaving Danithy Mansion, I hurried towards the harbor where Marsh's corpse still lay abandoned.
I found a relatively decent-looking small boat and helped Cordelia aboard.
There's no one left who can chase after us anymore.

name: Jonathan
message: Let's go！
Cordelia and I rowed the boat out towards the open sea off Arkham.
There's no one left who can lay a hand on us.
If we just let ourselves drift with the current, we'll probably wash up on some shore within a few days.
We'll never come near Arkham again.
Cordelia and I will settle down in a place where we can live without worrying about society, and from now on, we'll spend our days in seclusion.
Everything that happened here will be locked away in the depths of memory, and eventually, it will sink into a gentle fog of forgetfulness and disappear.
Is it really over like this？
Nai is dead, and all the residents of Arkham have vanished.
There is no one left who knows what Arkham was like in its former days.

name: Voice
message: Yes, the blood of the Deep One within you will remain forever.
You can never escape that curse in your lifetime.

name: Voice
message: The day will surely come when our overlord will once again reign over this world.
The day will surely come when chaos and terror completely envelop the world.

name: Voice
message: You can never escape it........
The evil voice inside me echoed many times, then faded away.
Will that day truly come？
However........
By my side, there is Cordelia.
She has entrusted everything to me and is sleeping soundly, completely at peace........
I, too, lay down beside her.
I had no more dreams.
